last_episode_to_air.name: The last performance
last_episode_to_air.overview: Through a longtime friend, Ah-yi and Il-deung learn of Ryu Min-hyuk's pained past. The magician disappears from the interrogation room.

name: The Sound of Magic
overview: An enigmatic magician living in an abandoned amusement park introduces magic into the life of a high schooler struggling with harsh realities.

episodes.name: Do you... believe in magic?
episodes.overview: Yoon Ah-yi’s silent scream for help is answered by Ri-eul, who appears before her during a time of need and makes her wonder: is he really a magician?

episodes.name: Don't let me dream any longer
episodes.overview: Set on exposing Ri-eul's secrets, Baek Ha-na enters the theme park with a camera and captures Ah-yi inside. Na Il-deung asks Ah-yi on a study date.

episodes.name: Merry-go-round
episodes.overview: Il-deung and Ah-yi make a deal to try to make each other's lives easier. Suspicious about Ri-eul, Il-deung secretly follows Ah-yi to her magic lessons.

episodes.name: Becoming an adult
episodes.overview: Il-deung begins questioning his path. Ha-na discovers shocking footage in the hidden camera from Ri-eul's room. Ah-yi finds comfort from the future.

episodes.name: Curse of asphalt
episodes.overview: Ha-na infuriates Ri-eul by snooping for evidence in his room. The police ask Ah-yi questions about a caped person of interest.

episodes.name: The last performance
episodes.overview: Through a longtime friend, Ah-yi and Il-deung learn of Ryu Min-hyuk's pained past. The magician disappears from the interrogation room.
